Package proj

Class PasswordHash

java.lang.Object
proj.PasswordHash
public class PasswordHash
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the Password Hashing class that is used on the Student's Passwords
Since:
2020-11-19
Version:
1.0
Author:
DSAI/1 Group 5

    static void PasswordHashed()
    Static method that is called to generate an ordered list of the Student's Usernames and their Corresponding hashed passwords in a text file

    Static method that generates an array of the Salt String for all students in the student list

  • Method Details

    • PasswordHashed

      public static void PasswordHashed() throws java.lang.Exception
      Static method that is called to generate an ordered list of the Student's Usernames and their Corresponding hashed passwords in a text file
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Signals that an error has been reached unexpectedly while parsing.

    • ReturnByteArray

      public static byte[][] ReturnByteArray()
      Static method that generates an array of the Salt String for all students in the student list
      Returns:
      SaltArray once the entire list of Salt Strings has been generated

    • ReturnHashedPasswordsArray

      public static java.lang.String[] ReturnHashedPasswordsArray()
      Static method that generates and assigns a random of the Hashed Passwords for all students in the student list
      Returns:
      HashedPasswords once the entire list of Hashed Student Passwords has been generated

    • Salt

      public static byte[] Salt​(java.lang.String StudentID, java.lang.String password)
      Static method that generates a random salt value for a student
      Parameters:
      StudentID - The StudentID of the student which the user wishes to Hash their corresponding password
      password - The password of the student which the user wishes to Hash
      Returns:
      salt The randomly generated salt string if no error occurs

    • ReturnHashInfo

      public static java.lang.String ReturnHashInfo​(java.lang.String StudentID, java.lang.String Password, byte[] salt)
      Static method that derives and prints a Student's ID and their corresponding hashed password
      Parameters:
      StudentID - The StudentID of the student which the user wishes to Hash their corresponding password
      Password - The password of the student which the user wishes to Hash
      salt - The random salt string that is used to generate the hashed password
      Returns:
      Finaloutput It is a string of a Student's ID and their corresponding hashed password

    • ReturnHashedPassword

      public static java.lang.String ReturnHashedPassword​(java.lang.String Password, byte[] salt)
      Static method that derives the Hashed version of the given password input
      Parameters:
      Password - The password of the student which the user wishes to Hash
      salt - The random salt string that is used to generate the hashed password
      Returns:
      Finaloutput It is the Hashed version of a given password
